creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Faegre
description: cruet set, with 5 bottles; stand with 7 circular restrainers and flat trays for 5 bottles; C-curved handle with acanthus leaf thumb piece; 4 scrolls and foliage incurved feet with baluster joints (f=stand), stand fully marked on underside; 2 small crystal bottles (d,e), one fitted with mustard spoon by "..." 1842, London; one medium cut-glass bottle (c) and 2 large crystal bottles (a,b) with applied silver scroll handles, lips and hinged lids; handles and lids apparently unmarked; d: tip of stopper chipped
marks:
Inscription

Engraved on bottom of stand: [H/ H
title: Cruet Set
